body: @haise01 most NTR are crap when it comes to creating a interesting story structure, it isn't just rare to find it's almost impossible.

but thanks, i know this kind of story is very rare, actually i can only remember two right now, it's Tachibana san chi by Jin, and Ima Ria...

@haise01 I'm not a big fan of NTR if you probably didn't know by the comments but, I'll see what I can do about it. So a hentai with a good foundation of love so it can be trample down ok I'm on it but, don't get your hopes up they're rare.

I don't understand people who come for the story anyway, the artwork was top-notch in this piece so it earns a fav from me. The story is absolutely irrelevant.
@haise01 I think the one you're looking for is A Mother's Love or Oyako no Omoi by Shinozuka Yuuji

However after that it just been the same it's sad.

For me his art for this type of works never get bored if he makes each works other heroines like that and mind break & netorare combo, only mind break will be good from him, but as we see he have NTR fetish too, for me it's very nice, his art is god and i need English once again !
